name: dvhopclN
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3
body: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wcel(cop(c0, c2), cxp(c1, c3)))

body.origin: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wcel(cop(c0, c2), cxp(c1, c3)))

cumulated.origin: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wcel(cop(c0, c2), cxp(c1, c3)))

comment: Closure of a ` DVecH ` vector expressed as ordered pair. (Contributed by NM, 20-Nov-2013.) (New usage is discouraged.)
